extension.description:
VoguePay Pin Dispenser Joomla Plugin

Thank you for installing Joomla VoguePay Plugin. This module is a customizable plugin to enable VoguePay Pin Dispenser on your Joomla content. A product use to sell dispensable pin product ,like scratch cards ,and downloadable product links , e.g for e-books. The following features are available:

  • Before using this module, it is neccessary you have already created a pin product on voguepay Merchant Product
  • you will therefore need copy the generated product code from voguepay to this plugin
  • This plugin allows merchant enter their voguepay merchant ID
  • This plugin allows buyers select the quantity to purchase if you set it
  • In your article,specify the product code and desired item name within TAG.sample {pdvoguepay} item="scratch card" | code ="536363782829" {/pdvoguepay}
  • This will be replaced by a buy now button for your pin products

    • Visit https://voguepay.com for details.



    If you like this module please Leave your Feedback & Like Us on Facebook :)

    Thanks!
    VoguePay Voguepay pin dispenser plugin for Joomla by Voguepay
